      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="en">Expected and observed muons</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erwartete und beobachtete muons</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Muons prévus et observés</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Muons previstos e observados</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Muons previsti ed osservati</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αναμενόμενος και παρατηρηθείς muons</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Muons previstos y observados</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates the amount of muons expected in absence of time dilation and the amount of muons observed in the 6 km atmosphere.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cosmic radiations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">muons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">special theory of relativity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">time dilation</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht die Menge der 
muons, die in Ermangelung der Zeitausdehnung erwartet werden und die 
Menge der muons, die in der 6 Kilometer Atmosphäre beobachtet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre la quantité de muons 
prévus en l'absence de la dilatation de temps et la quantité de 
muons observés dans l'atmosphère de 6 kilomètres.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra a quantidade de muons 
esperados na ausência do dilation do tempo e a quantidade de muons 
observados na atmosfera de 6 quilômetros.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra la quantità di muons 
previsti in assenza della dilatazione di tempo e la quantità di muons
osservati nell'atmosfera da 6 chilometri.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί το ποσό muons που 
αναμένονται στην απουσία χρονικής διαστολής και το ποσό muons 
που παρατηρούνται στην ατμόσφαιρα 6 χλμ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra la cantidad de muons 
esperados en la ausencia de la dilatación del tiempo y la cantidad de
muons observados en la atmósfera de 6 kilómetros.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kosmische Strahlungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">muons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">spezielle Theorie der Relativität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeitausdehnung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">rayonnements cosmiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">muons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">théorie spéciale de relativité</string>
          </keyword>
